text:
Seedlink Technology | Shanghai | Full-Time | Onsite | Software Engineers, DevOps, Data Science

Seedlink is using natural language processing and machine learning to transform the HR industry. We analyse gigabytes of data to produce models of ideal candidates. We then match candidates’ responses against our models to predict which candidates best fit our clients’ requirements. We have clients all over the world in many different industries.

Our stack is React/Redux + GraphQL + Python/Django on AWS/Aliyun running Linux via K8s/Docker and Ansible/Jenkins.

We're looking for a variety of engineers: frontend, backend, test, devops, data science. More at https://www.seedlinktech.com/about/careers/tech/

Happy to receive CVs, questions: simon.blanchard@seedlinktech.com
